net.markkozel.lc3

Class Instruction_Operate

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.markkozel.lc3.Instruction
      • net.markkozel.lc3.Instruction_Operate

  • public class Instruction_Operate
extends Instruction
    Container for LC-3 Operate Instructions

    LC-3 Operate instructions:

    • ADD - Addition for Register-only and Register-Immediate Value
    • AND - Logical And Register-only and Register-Immediate Value
    • Not - Logical Not Register-Only

    Container parses Operate source code into binary values for OpCode and Operands If line is invalid, container sets isGood and errorMsg

    Author:
    Mark Kozel
